title: 820-4924-A with kernel panic attacks
message:
Hello, i have an 820-4924-A board that has kernel panic attacks from time to time (specially after OS loads).

I tried 2 different SSD´s and swapped the motherboard into another working machine with no avail. The motherboard has no signs of water damage. 

The error i get is as follows:


Machine-check capabilities: 0x0000000001000c07

panic(cpu 3 caller 0xffffff8018fedd19): "Machine Check at 0xffffff801c074236, registers:\n" "CR0: 0x0000000080010033, CR2: 0x00007fd676736000, CR3: 0x00000001a2b740b4, CR4: 0x00000000003626e0\n" "RAX: 0x0000000085846d84, RBX: 0x0000000014a0288a, RCX: 0x000000006f1b4964, RDX: 0xffffffb0a2358480\n" "RSP: 0xffffffa08f64b300, RBP: 0xffffffa08f64b4a0, RSI: 0x00000000a9308918, RDI: 0x00000000845965d6\n" "R8:  0x000000000ec913ca, R9:  0x0000000014e12aea, R10: 0x000000007fc0d1f1, R11: 0x000000000078bd6e\n" "R12: 0x0000000007225ebe, R13: 0x000000002cbad08b, R14: 0x00000000a9348d18, R15: 0x00000000cba16b1a\n" "RFL: 0x0000000000000202, RIP: 0xffffff801c074236, CS:  0x0000000000000008, SS:  0x0000000000000010\n" "Error code: 0x0000000000000000\n"@/AppleInternal/BuildRoot/Library/Caches/com.apple.xbs/Sources/xnu/xnu-7195.60.75/osfmk/i386/trap_native.c:168

title: 820-4924-A with kernel panic attacks
message:
Possibly CPU error; maybe RAM, less probable.
If already tested the board with other RIO board and battery, then try known good BIOS (just in case).
